title: Everything's black in the interface
body:
Hi,

I just built my new PC and I realize my lol game interface is kind of buggy as in the attachment. Every frame is black but I can still play the game. Does anyone come up with this before? Kind of annoying.

replies.body:
Did you install a fresh copy of Windows, or was it a computer that you ordered to build?

Not that it really matters; here's what I want you to try.

Go into your Internet Options and set everything you can back to their defaults. Then, go to your Security tab and set the security for the Internet to be Medium-Low.
Seems like something is blocking the access to that content.
The only thing could be anti-virus but I've tried to temporarily disable it but this still happens.
